---Lynxiz---

Lynxiz trots into the small frigid valley, her eyes peeled. Her breath 
puffs a swirling frosty mist into the crisp icy air. She stretches and 
looks around for signs of other robots. "Termitron, you see 
anything?" Without really waiting for an answer, she continues 
looking without much success. Her head tilts to look up at the 
ridges surrounding the Valley, her nose twitches as she picks up 
the scent of a deer, but she shurgs and continues. "Termitron, we'll 
go to that peak over there and take a look around," she points to a 
large mountain that protrudes nearly to the cloud line. "We might 
be able to see something from there. I think I'll try a commlink 
broadcast but I don't think we'll get much in this valley, we're too 
surrounded with obstructions... on the top maybe.." She finishes, 
the last part to herself. She starts plodding on to the peak, her fur 
tuffted ears perked and listening to see if Termitron follows.
